ComicInfo.Series: Red Sonja and Vampirella Meet Betty and Veronica
ComicInfo.Summary:
And so Red Sonja and Vampirella’s excellent adventure with Betty and Veronica comes to an end. Who will survive and rule the throne of Drakulon? Will they meet the Time Traveler’s wife? Is time a flat circle? Will our heroines continue to party on? Read to find out!
